group_1.textRight: So you mean to say that you told her who you@really are, Himuro-dono?!

group_1.textLeft: And her reaction?!@Normally they wouldn't believe that!
It's not as if she's fully grasped the meaning yet,@but...
Shirogane believed before she digested it and@swallowed what I told her.
That's what she said to me.

group_1.textRight: I kind of wonder why I put the brakes on myself...
I have people I trust, too.
And yet, I just felt obliged to keep it a secret.
Well, I am the same as you, Sasha-dono.
Despite my desire to let them know,
I thought that I could not reveal myself...

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, I had my doubts...
Whatever our circumstances, we had our@wishes granted.
It's cheating. It's not how life is supposed to be.
That's why, I thought it might be nothing more@than seeking pity from someone.
I even wondered whether it was arrogant to@have such high expectations.
But looking back, I feel like I have lost more@than I have gained.

group_1.textRight: ...Our lives are constantly put on the line.
Not even allowed to live without risking your life...
Besides, if your soul is stained with filth,@you become a Witch...

group_1.textLeft: And even if you get your wish granted,@it doesn't always end well.
I won't ask too much because of privacy concerns.
But I'm sure you all have an idea...

group_1.textRight: So, in that light, we're all a lot unhappier than@we need to be...
If I'm not mistaken, I'm probably more unhappy@than I was before I got my wish...

group_1.textLeft: Then, wouldn't it be nice to get a little bit of@our own happiness back...?
Such a thought went through my mind.

group_1.textRight: In other words, it's not arrogant to take solace@in telling someone else...
Only making up for what we lost, that much@is forgivable...

group_1.textLeft: Thus, consider this a consultation.@Why don't the three of us give it a shot?
A movement to make the world aware of@the existence of Magical Girls.
